text: “Gei digaula ga hagalongo adu gi di goe, gei goe gaa hula goodou mo nia dagi digaula gi baahi di king o Egypt, gei goe ga helekai gi mee boloo, ‘Yihowah go di God o digau Hebrew gu heetugi mai gi di au, gei goe dugua mai gimaadou gii hula gi lodo di anggowaa i nia laangi e dolu, e hai madau tigidaumaha ang gi Yihowah di madau God.’
